A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is exactly what you'd expect from a cheesy space movie\, nothing more nothing less\, and that's good. As with every other movie in the franchise the story isn't the most brilliant\, the whole \"Space Leia\" scene was particularly awful and they missed several opportunities to finish off her character in a memorable way\, but overall The Last Jedi does it's job pretty well at delivering solid entertainment.
